catalog_info.title: Laboratory Research on Emotional Disorders
catalog_info.notes: For information about joining the lab, contact the instructor at rjm@wjh.harvard.edu
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Open to graduate and undergraduate students working in the instructor's laboratory.
catalog_info.description: Involves readings, seminar discussion, and research on emotional disorders conducted in the instructor's laboratory (e.g., social anxiety disorder, complicated grief, obsessive-compulsive disorder).
